website_summaries.verdict: An economical cover that protects a boat against dirt, debris, and more.
pros: Fits V-hull runabout boats up to 22-feet long and 106-inches wide
Easy to wash in warm water
cons: Buckle and strap system can be difficult to use

customer_reviews.title: Very nice fit on my 19' glastron sx195
customer_reviews.text: Immediate observations: - Thick material and less wrinkles than most covers - Well placed air vents - Initially thought it might be small buy it is a nice snug fit. - Quality straps, really like the design of securing to trailer as opposed going under the boat. -UV protection is TBD but this material already looks better than some other covers that have faded after one year. Only design suggestion I would have is to have a gray strap option. Black straps are very prominent. Will not fit a boat with tower, however going up one size probably will.
customer_reviews.author: viagap

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it today and received it today. A nasty storm rolled through so I ran out and threw it on in the middle of a monsoon. Blowing winds, lightning hitting trees across the street and the boat filling of water from the torrential down poir. I was able to get it on and secured to my 17" Bowrider, solo. I don't have a center support so I knew there would be puddling. I ran out there inbetween rain storms and it held steady. Didn't tear or budge in the wind. The bow is tight enough to not need any rods for support. So far. After a few hours of having it, I am pleased. It's keeping the boat dry!
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy!
customer_reviews.text: The Boat Cover protects the boat entirely. It was a good purchase. It fit pretty good too and I have a 19 ft sea ray....
customer_reviews.author: Jose rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Not Waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: This boat cover is not waterproof! The boat cover is fantastic, sturdy material, straps have buckles on both sides so you can undo each side easily without having to crawl under the boat. However....its not waterproof, my boat is soaked after one snow/rain. Whats worse is now its covered so its just a trap for mold. I want so badly to give this 5 stars, but I am going to have to buy something that can actually withstand the elements. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: This cover is very nice at any price but especially for 100 dollars
customer_reviews.text: This cover is very nice at any price but especially for 100 dollars. I have a Yamaha 21ft jet boat which has a large swim platform built into the boat and the cover was an inch or two short. It still fit nicely every where else. The quality is great and was nice and tight on the boat. I ended up returning the cover to get a larger one but I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage if you choose the correct size,
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Nice cover for the price so not real heavy. Haven't been able to tell if it will hold up during a bad storm but so far in rain and semi high winds has done fine.
customer_reviews.author: twenatina

customer_reviews.title: Fits almost like its custom
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this cover! We have a bayliner br185 and it fits nicely for not being custom made. Thick quality fabric, stitched well. Has vents which is a plus. I had previously paid half the price and got a cover off EBAY and a strap ripped immediately and it allowed water to drip through the fabric. I was hesitant to pay more for a generic fit cover, but I am extremely happy with my purchase. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Andi

customer_reviews.title: Good cover, but parts are needed to shed water
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality cover but you'll need a set of center supports to cause rain to roll down and not pool. I also had to get a set of canvas clamps and straps to shore up slack areas to avoid rain from pooling. When rain pools it only grows deeper, and almost impossible to empty. If the pooling gets to the vent covers you'll get water between the cover's two layers which is difficult to empty. I'd buy it again, but definitely need the center poles and extra straps.
customer_reviews.author: Gary V. Ide

customer_reviews.title: AmazonBasics continues to impress
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good cover and is about $50 cheaper than a comparable one I was looking at a store down the road. The canvas is reasonably thick and the stitching is robust. They used a nice upholstery thread that does not break by hand, with several area of double stitching. The fit is good, I used the 20'-22' cover on my 20' boat. I'd rather it be a little bigger, and it works for me. I added poles and vents to mine to prevent water pooling and to keep humidity lower inside. Overall it's a nice setup to keep rain and UV from aging the inside.
customer_reviews.author: JayP

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit my 1963 Starcraft Holiday 18' bowrider
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 17'-19' cover after taking measurements of my boat, which is 18.3' long or 18.9' long including outboard. It was very tight for length to just cover the boat. The ultimate failure, though, was it didn't fit over the windshield for width. It seemed to be 4-6" too narrow. It wasn't wide enough to go over the rub rail. It really bummed me out because I love the quality of its construction. I returned this cover and will be ordering the 20'-22' cover.
customer_reviews.author: M. Rackouski

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Buy this cover. I have it on my 19 ft bass boat and it's completely waterproof, super easy to put on and take off, and hasn't show any signs of wear or fading in the 3 months I've owned it. I also trailer it with this on, and it handles it just fine.
customer_reviews.author: amp381

customer_reviews.title: Goes on easily and securely
customer_reviews.text: Just got the boat cover yesterday, so I can't rate the durability or other features. But the design with the attached tethers that wrap around the trailer frame and then adjusted to tighten worked quite well. I put it on in 10 minutes and an hour later a storm with heavy rain and high winds came through. Looked at it this morning and everything is still tight and secure.
customer_reviews.author: John D Dorian

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Can’t beat it for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Great cover for the money. Does what it’s supposed to do. I have it propped up with a support in 2 sections which keeps water from pooling up. It does allow some water to seep through if its a really heavy downpour (Florida Summers). The straps are also a bit too short for a boat my height. For those two things it looses a star. Let’s see how it holds up here in Florida.
customer_reviews.author: Alan rybak

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT FIT A 19' YAMAHA JET BOAT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this if you have a 19' Yamaha Jet Boat. It doesn't fit. The length is correct and so is the beam but the beam on the Yamaha is wider past the cockpit and this cover gets too narrow as it goes to the bow. It wont stretch over the bow. Other than that it appears to be a good cover for the cost and I will be returning this and going to the next size up. FYI I bought the next size up (20' - 22'?) and it works plus it has enough extra to wrap around and under the stern swim platform.
customer_reviews.author: William Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Use a cover over a tarp if storing outside
customer_reviews.text: A very heavy cover. I have found that using a heavy tarp under a cover keeps the boat dry if not stored in or under a shed. The cover PROVIDES sunlight UV protection for the tarp while the tarp provides a waterproof cover. Together they provide complete protection 2-3 years or more. Watch for water ponding and do not let snow accumulate more than 2 inches.
customer_reviews.author: STEVEN E.

customer_reviews.title: It BARELY fit my 21' cabin cruiser! You might consider one size up for this application.
customer_reviews.text: I am using this to cover my 21' 1979 ABC cabin cruiser/ski boat project. It is almost too small for the boat, but it is a cabin cruiser so maybe bigger than the type boat it was designed for? The thing I didn't like was that there was no tag that said "front" like the instructions. There is a tag right in the front though, and double thickness at the bow. There is ONE D ring for the aft end too. I got it just in time to put on before snow covered it up. Since my boat is larger I also had to make extenders out of rope to fasten some of the straps to the trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Oppliger

customer_reviews.title: Better than others - lasted 1.5 yrs - but not yet value for the money
customer_reviews.text: I've had several low cost covers of multiple brands over the years, that had lasted only one year on average. I bought this item from Amazon on November 2018. The price at the time was $99. It is July 2020 and this cover has started to leak, has mold on the inner side, and is starting to release a sort of dust as it might be starting to disintegrate. I give it 3 stars because it is better than others out there, but still not what I would wish it would be for the price. It now costs $130 what I think is too much for something that last 1.5 yrs.
customer_reviews.author: Marcos S.

customer_reviews.title: A well made quality covert. Up date- 21 September 2018- I really like this cover
customer_reviews.text: I have a 1998 21’Sea Ray Signiture 210 Bow Rider stern drive. This cover fits very nicely with a little to spare. Well made and durable. My boat stays in its own shed so I need a cover just to keep the dust etc out. I won’t be towing it with the cover on, so I expect this cover to last along time. Can’t beat the price for this quality. You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Johnson

customer_reviews.title: 18.5 ft Bass Tracker
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so I could move boat outside during remodel. After over 10 inches of rain I went out today to check it. Undid 3 buckles and hit the bilge pump. Maybe 12 ounces of water came out. I'm impressed! I planned to spray it with camp dry or something like it but never did. Seems so far it didn't need it.
customer_reviews.author: kw

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover for the money
customer_reviews.text: I needed a cheap cover, so I purchased this from Amazon. Most of their AmazonBasics brand items have been a good deal. The problem I have with this cover is no matter how tight I cinch this down, I have pockets of water that form on top of the boat. I wish they designed this in a way it wouldn't collect water.
customer_reviews.author: J.K.

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, but far from waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Kept noticing water on the deck after rainstorms. Went out after this latest one and can see the water dripping through the seams, and light through the thread holes! Gave it 2 weeks, but it's going back. I thought I was getting a good one based on reviews, but experience shows otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Mad Cow

customer_reviews.title: Fits great and seems solid
customer_reviews.text: I just put this on today so I can't speak to the longevity of it yet, but it seems like it is made very well. I have a 17ft 1981 Lund Tyee with a 90HP Johnson and this fits over my bow mount trolling motor and my outboard. Very happy with the purchase so far, will update after it goes through this winter.
customer_reviews.author: IdahoBiker

customer_reviews.title: All seams leak
customer_reviews.text: Every single seam leaks including the entire length of each and every strap. Steady drip of water down the entire length of every strap. Rather than return it, I opted to spray every seam with water sealer.
customer_reviews.author: Ven

customer_reviews.title: inexpensive but good quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Ankona Native SUV skiff to protect it from leaves, pollen and rain while it was being stored outside. This cover fit surprisingly well considering it is an off-the-shelf product. putting the cover on and taking it off is fairly easy, doesn't take too much time. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Van Hook

customer_reviews.title: ... for an inferior boat cover when this one is better. I like the fact that it attaches to ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't pay high dollar for an inferior boat cover when this one is better. I like the fact that it attaches to the trailer which seems to work better that going underneath the entire boat.
customer_reviews.author: T. L. Guinn

customer_reviews.title: Straps are short
customer_reviews.text: The cover itself fits fine but after you add the cover supports the straps are too short. I has to use straps from an old boat cover and add the length on. I have a 20'6" v hull bow rider with windshield that is 90" wide. Just got the cover today.
customer_reviews.author: Coolharts

customer_reviews.title: Snug but good for the $$$
customer_reviews.text: Seems like good material. It fit snug, any smaller and it wouldn't make it. Too bad they don't sell 19' to 20'. For under a hundred bucks it's great. (19' Glasstron SSV 195)
customer_reviews.author: besinger

customer_reviews.title: great cover
customer_reviews.text: This is a good cover for your boat. easy to put on and take off and material is thick. This is the second one we have purchased. the first one lasted us about 6 years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If it fits ?
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the boat cover that should fit an 18.5' runabout with a windshield. It was too short and not wide enough to go over the windshield. It would have torn if strapped down. Described as 276" long and 116" wide. So I am returning it and ordered the cover for the 20 - 22' boat. It fit but is way too long . It was described as 288" long and 120" wide. Like a foot longer and 4"wider. Your crew needs to check their tape measure ! It must be 2.5' longer and 1.75" wider.
customer_reviews.author: Susan L. Janecek

customer_reviews.title: ok for the price
customer_reviews.text: one strap came missing so when i drive with the cover on the boat cover moves. didn't notice till it was to late to return.or else i would have returned it
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Great great cover
customer_reviews.text: What a great cover! I have bought more expensive covers that weren't as good as this cover. I will defiantly but this again and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P

customer_reviews.title: Water resistant NOT waterproof
customer_reviews.text: This boat cover is NOT waterproof as the title (when I purchased) stated. Water leaked into the boat and fortunately my new vinyl was yet to be installed. Will need to purchase another one from somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: dandamanimal

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: It seems well made, sheds water, and doesn’t show the dirt. The straps are more than long enough and it has an elastic edge to hold it in place as you secure it or just tuck the boat away. Reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: WILLIAM H WHITSETT

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Fit my husbands bass boat just like it should ,his is a 17ft run about,however the rod wasn’t in the package and it was supposed to be included
customer_reviews.author: ckiser1

customer_reviews.title: good winter cover for boat storage.
customer_reviews.text: great winter cover , lasts 2-3 seasons and toss. protects you from using your expensive summer cover. i’m on my second one ! great value.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Kirkwood

customer_reviews.title: Great fit. Pulled the old one off and slipped ...
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. Pulled the old one off and slipped this one on like it belonged. Good, solid construction and very easy. No loose straps to contend with.
customer_reviews.author: J&M Chisum

customer_reviews.title: Great cover
customer_reviews.text: Month in and it seams to be made well and keeps all the leaves and water out of my boat. You do want to make sure that you have a support in your boat to keep the cover from sagging from water. You want all that water to beable to run off the cover
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: So far it's been good, fits my boat well
customer_reviews.text: So far it's been good, fits my boat well , the straps are way better then using a rope or bungee cords. Hopefully it last.
customer_reviews.author: Jarrod

customer_reviews.title: not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: As someone else said. Not waterproof. Water soaked through right at the seam by the window. So unless water crawled in from the bottom, anything is possible, but im returning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Lasted "okay" for one year. Then began shedding its reflective material all over everything. Straps broke, cover tore, leaks water, doesn't vent... what else is wrong. The whole thing sucks. Convenient its only a one year warranty. They do this on purpose to screw the consumer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rips easily
customer_reviews.text: Tore within a week of putting it on. Not very much wind either.
customer_reviews.author: michelle jones

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: It’s good product. Just feel like it’s a little short. I have a 21 foot boat and it barely covers my boat
customer_reviews.author: ANGEL S ORELLANA

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews, but this cover has exceeded my expectations. I have it on my sea ray 185 with swim platform. It is an excellent fit.
customer_reviews.author: R. Cornett

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice cover. Fits my 95 bass tracker pro 16. Covers up the whole boat and the top of the outboard.
customer_reviews.author: Viciouswhitekid

customer_reviews.title: good cover, good price
customer_reviews.text: I have a 16' I/O runabout, the cover is plenty long, pulls over the outboard drive. I may go with the smaller version next time, but am happy with this so far. time will tell if it hold up
customer_reviews.author: Chuck S

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat the price and quality of this cover.
customer_reviews.text: For the price you can’t beat this cover. It fit my 17’ 1984 Bass Tracker. It keeps the water out of the boat keeping my new carpet in great shape. It has straps all around it for a nice secure fit. It’s a bit oversized (probably for the newer wider boats) but that give me more material to work with all around. I even have my outboard under it. Totally worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Bradley

customer_reviews.title: A little small
customer_reviews.text: Barely fit 18 ft boat. Would go with Trailerite next time. They fit better
customer_reviews.author: C. Widmer

customer_reviews.title: Fits as expected
customer_reviews.text: The cover fits my 17 ft Astro bass very well. Although for my boat it could have been a little narrower. Otherwise a very good cover for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Randall C.

customer_reviews.title: It’s a cover
customer_reviews.text: Not super heavy duty, but above average for the price. Will see how it holds up with time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not include support pole as manual states
customer_reviews.text: Fits boat ok, straps on good, but the operator/owner manual clearly state that a support pole is included as part of the product and it is not, or at least mine didn't contain one. Otherwise seems like an ok product.
customer_reviews.author: James H. Workman

customer_reviews.title: Fits great!
customer_reviews.text: Others have said the straps were too short but there was extra length for our boat. We think this is a great product that I would definitely recommend again.
customer_reviews.author: Peeweeperkins

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: Cover arrived, fit nice and did not hold water. After about 4 months it was already tearing where straps attach and around cleats. Had it replaced, the new one lasted about another 4 months and is tearing like the first one. Maybe ok for inside storage but does not hold up outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: JWG19

customer_reviews.title: Good quality cover
customer_reviews.text: Very nice cover, fits our boat perfectly. Nice fit and good straps.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gilfillan

customer_reviews.title: This boat cover is so nice for the money
customer_reviews.text: This boat cover is so nice for the money. It fits my boat perfectly and the quality of everything is great.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hyde

customer_reviews.title: Boat cover
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product at a good price! I really like the cover.
customer_reviews.author: bt47

customer_reviews.title: really good cover
customer_reviews.text: really liked this cover, the material was pretty heavy canvas fit my 21 foot thompson ski boat like a glove would not fit a 22ft boat. straps are to short to work but i am going to add on to them so no problem
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Mold!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this thing less than 4 months ago and it’s alrwsdy covered with mold. It’s even kept in covered storage out of the weather.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: This product is garbage. It is not waterproof at all and in the month that we have had it on our boat it has let in so much moisture that the inside is molding. I would return it but we are past our return window. Do not waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: megan rosales

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: A very cheap product straps rotted off first summer didn’t asked for a refund because I didn’t want to waste my time with it. But price was fairly cheap worked fine until straps rotted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit
customer_reviews.text: This was a great fit and very sturdy and good quality. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best value in a universal fit boat cover
customer_reviews.text: Overall very good and exceeds my expectations. Good design, quality materials and excellent fabrication.
customer_reviews.author: D. Cushing

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this cover. I took hours deciding which one to pick and I’m glad I chose this one
customer_reviews.author: Tony G

customer_reviews.title: Quality and fit
customer_reviews.text: I got the product. It's higher quality than I was expecting but it does not fit a deck boat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked well through its 1st Colorado winter
customer_reviews.text: Hope I can get a few more winters out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Watch length fit
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 19-21 foot cover and it is a little large.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Norwood

customer_reviews.title: Great cover, very impressed.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome fit on my 18.5 bayliner / not that mesh like stuff
customer_reviews.author: Soggy Biscuit

customer_reviews.title: Impressive for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this. We just had a ton of rain and very little was found inside my boat.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: ... i think i have finally found one of the best.
customer_reviews.text: i've owned quite a few boat covers before but i think i have finally found one of the best.
customer_reviews.author: BERT BAGLEY

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Had been covering my boat with a large tarp but I was buying a new tarp at least twice a year I’m hoping this boat cover will last longer, it seems to be pretty good quality for the price and it fit my boat perfect I would recommend for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Puddles are its weakness
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you have a system to keep water from puddling up with this cover. One night of hard rain and my mid pole gave out and caused it to puddle, its leaked through the material into the boat. Other wise kept dirt and debri out as well as any other cover.
customer_reviews.author: braden mure

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: fits perfectly kept boat dry in massive rain storms no color bleeding
customer_reviews.author: Clinton Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: Not as nice as I had hope. Cheap material, straps attached to cover, wouldn’t buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 6 Chaparral Sport just like a glove
customer_reviews.text: For the price you can not complaint. It went over my 18.6 Chaparral Sport just like a glove!
customer_reviews.author: MrGQ

customer_reviews.title: nylon tie downs
customer_reviews.text: You need to make the nylon tie down straps longer. We had an old cover so we were able to make them work. Other than that it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Good quality boat cover
customer_reviews.text: Good quality boat cover. Was processed and shipped timely. Fits perfectly on our bass boat and looks good too.
customer_reviews.author: lynn bialek

customer_reviews.title: Good cover fits nice to my mb sport boat 21ft ...
customer_reviews.text: Good cover fits nice to my mb sport boat 21ft Easy clip in and out Good product for a old boat that you can’t find original cover
customer_reviews.author: OFIR KAPAH

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: fits the boat, not sure it is as heavy duty as advertised
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Much better than expected for the price. Saves my boat.
customer_reviews.author: SUPERJIN1985

customer_reviews.title: Great Cover, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This cost far less than any other boat cover I've owned, and the quality seems very good. The straps are nice, it has air vents, and it fits my 2004 Crownline 202 BR well. It seems like a very good quality product for an excellent price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy off and easy on boat cover
customer_reviews.text: It is also water proof and keeps my boat dry
customer_reviews.author: Bob Gill

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Seemingly of good quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for ‘18 G3 Sportsman 17 w bow mount trolling motor. Perfect! Seemingly of good quality.. great price! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: RANDALL F.

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my husbands alumacraft
customer_reviews.text: This cover definitely has some good quality material, I bought for my husbands 19" alumacraft bass tracker and for not being a custom cover it fit pretty good in my opinion over the boat. We are pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits snug and looks great, will update in the future for wear and tear
customer_reviews.author: Carl J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect on my 18ft searay. High quality materials. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Time will tell if it will hold up to the sun but for the price if I can get 2 years out of the cover it will have worked as good or better than the $400 cover I bought last ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Stratos 201 Pro XL, 21ft bass boat. The cover fits over my deck seats and held up to filling up with water during a recent storm when I did not have it strapped tight enough for the water to run off. Time will tell if it will hold up to the sun but for the price if I can get 2 years out of the cover it will have worked as good or better than the $400 cover I bought last time.
customer_reviews.author: Moss

customer_reviews.title: Quality/value
customer_reviews.text: Great cover for the money ! Good quality and straps
customer_reviews.author: M R P

customer_reviews.title: Solid boat cover
customer_reviews.text: Well made product. Held up much better than comparable priced covers purchased recently. Well though out attachment system.
customer_reviews.author: Craig M. Behrens

customer_reviews.title: fit perfect
customer_reviews.text: lets see how long it lasts installed may 26, 2020
customer_reviews.author: Ti m VanDemark

customer_reviews.title: Strong
customer_reviews.text: Fit boat well. Seems strong and looks like it will hold up for a few years
customer_reviews.author: Erik E.

customer_reviews.title: Great Cover for the money.
customer_reviews.text: A little more durable than the Classic Accessories brand for a lot less money than buying at farm and fleet.
customer_reviews.author: Chris D.

customer_reviews.title: Fit My Boat Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2005 Bass Tracker PT 175, 17ft in length. This cover fits it perfectly. Material seems to be durable. Happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Better than described
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect. I got a larger size because I wanted to lower and cover the wake tower. Fits great, good quality. Can’t beat the price
customer_reviews.author: Doug Laube

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and love the ties that are sewn into the cover
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cover
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best cover for my boat I have a bass tracker 19'
customer_reviews.author: michael payne

customer_reviews.title: Quite pleased!
customer_reviews.text: It appears to be durable, it’s been on for a month, time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: RUTH E ALI

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: By far the best boat cover for the money, fits great and tiedowns are very secure.
customer_reviews.author: CFM-56

customer_reviews.title: Check the size before unfolding it.
customer_reviews.text: Fits great after I got the right size. They package a 16’ in a 22’ box. Not cool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seem like good quality and fits our boat well. Very happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: jl

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit
customer_reviews.text: Cover seems very well made but straps that go under boat to other side are not long enough
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: It is missing pieces.
customer_reviews.text: The two free straps labeled C are missing and the cover is not quite long enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: AmazonBasics Boat Cover for V-Hull Runabouts and Bass Boats
feature_bullets: Trailerable boat cover protects v-hull runabout boats (20-22 feet long by up to 106 inches wide) from outdoor elements when storing or transporting
Made of 100% polyester for exceptional durability; won't shrink or stretch, ensuring a long-lasting secure fit
Sleek light-grey color; weighs 14 pounds; washes clean with warm water
Backed by an AmazonBasics limited one-year warranty; measures 288 by 120 by 30 inches (LxWxH)
